Body: @Dusty Grayson​ thanks for creating this draft: How to Configure File System Scans to Look for Sensitive Data Discovery | Knowledge | Salesforce. Would you mind adding to the draft how sensitive data settings can be applied to file system SEEK jobs specifically, not just the global settings? Thanks :)
